questions.text: Why didn't Shang kill Mulan when he found out she was a woman disguised as a male member of the Fa family?
options: Shang's army asked for her safety.
Fa Zhou, Mulan's father, begged for her life.
questions.explanation:
Shang owed her his life.

	While helping the army fight the Huns, Mulan was injured. When he found out she was a girl, Shang was going to kill her, but threw down his sword and proclaimed a life for a life. He and the others left her in the snow while they continued to the city.

questions.text: Mulan called for her "little brother" when she woke up one morning. Who was her "little brother"?
questions.explanation:
Dog.

	Mulan's "little brother" was a dog that helped her with her chores by making more of a mess than being a helper. Her dog was seen at the beginning of the movie feeding the chickens and at the end of the movie feeding the chickens.

questions.text: While preparing the men for battle, what did Shang put at the top of a log for the men to grab when they reached the top?
questions.explanation:
Arrow.

	Shang gave the men weights to use to climb up the log to retrieve the arrow. Mulan was the first person to climb the log and retrieve the arrow, subsequently throwing it at Shang's feet.

questions.text: When Mulan went to meet the matchmaker, did the matchmaker like her?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The matchmaker thought that Mulan was too skinny and had no hips for childbirth. She also said that Mulan would bring dishonor to her family.

questions.text: To prove to Mulan's family that she saved the emperor, the emperor gave her General Yu's sword and what other item?
options: A position as his right hand person
questions.explanation:
Emperor's medallion.

	In order to thank Mulan and let her family know that she saved his life, the emperor gave Mulan his medallion and Shan Yu's sword. Mulan took them back to her father and gave them to Fa Zhou as gifts from the emperor.

questions.text: While walking to meet General Li and the other men, what did Ling tell the men they should be thinking of instead of the long walk?
questions.explanation:
A girl worth fighting for.

	Ling started the song "A Girl Worth Fighting For" which Yao and Chien-Po joined in on eventually bringing Mulan (as Ping) into the song. The song is also featured in "Mulan II".

questions.text: How many men in the Fa family could serve in the Imperial army?
questions.explanation:
One.

	Men from each family were called to fight in the Imperial army against the Huns. In Mulan's family, there was only Mulan's father. He had already fought in one war and was older and had problems with his leg. Mulan cut her hair, took her father's armor and his orders and went to join the army.

questions.text: What animal was Mushu, the former guardian of Mulan's ancestors?
questions.explanation:
Dragon.

	Mushu was the former guardian of Mulan's ancestors. After one of the ancestors was beheaded under his guardianship, Mushu was demoted. When Mulan's ancestors woke up they wanted a stone dragon to protect Mulan, but Mushu accidentally destroyed the stone dragon so he went in the stone dragon's place. After the ancestors saw how Mushu protected Mulan, they restored him as guardian.

questions.text: How did the Huns find Shang and his army while they were in the snow covered mountains?
options: The army's complaints echoed off the mountains
questions.explanation:
Mushu set off a rocket.

	Mulan (as Ping) was traveling with the weapons over the snow covered mountains when Mushu set off a rocket that exploded in the air. The Huns attacked and Mulan caused an avalanche to take out the Hun army. Mulan saved Shang's life when the avalanche propelled them over a cliff.

questions.text: When Shang showed up at Mulan's house, she asked him to stay for dinner. Who asked Shang if he could stay forever?
questions.explanation:
Grandma Fa.

	When Grandma Fa saw the gifts Mulan brought her father, she told Mulan's mother she would have rather Mulan brought back a man. When Shang arrived and Mulan invited him to dinner, Grandma Fa asked Shang if he could stay forever.
